div.ab:
بسم اللّــه الرّحمن الرّحيم
كتاب جماعة ما ارتفع
من مساحة كورة دلاص وقرى أهنــاس
من أرض الزّرع والكروم والأجنّة وغير ذلك
فيــهــا من كورة دلاص ثمنية ألف وتسعة وثلثيــنن فدّانا
من ذلك أرض السّجلّات ثلثة آلف وثماني مائة وأربــعين وأربعة فدّانا فدادين
الفضل على السّجلّات ألفين وثلثمائة وأربعة فدادين
زرع الأمير حفظه اللّه ستّــين ستّة فدّانا فدادين
قطيعة عبد
ومنها قرى أهناس خمسة ألف وأربع مائة وستّــة وثلثين
فــدّانا
من ذلك أرض السّجلّات أربعة ألف ومائتن وخمسة وأربعين فدّانا
الفضل على السّجلّات ألف ومائة وتسعين فدّانا
فجميع فضل كورة دلاص وقرى أهــناس
على السّجلّات
وبويط وقرى أهناس

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
kitābu ǧamāʿaẗi mā ĭrtafaʿa
min misāḥaẗi kūraẗi dalāṣa wa qurà ʾahnāsa
min ʾarḍi ăz zarʿi wa ăl kurūmi wa ăl ʾaǧinnaẗi wa ġayri ḏālika ***
fī hā min kūraẗi dalāṣa ṯamāniyaẗu ʾālāf:in wa tisʿaẗ:un wa ṯalāṯīna faddān:an
min ḏālika ʾarḍu ăs siǧillāti ṯalāṯaẗu ʾālāf:in wa ṯamānī miʾaẗ:in wa ʾarbaʿīna ʾarbaʿaẗu faddān:an fadādīna
ăl faḍlu ʿalà ăs siǧillāti ʾalfayna wa ṯalāṯu miʾaẗ:in wa ʾarbaʿaẗu fadādīna
zarʿu ăl ʾamīri ḥafiẓa hu ăl lāhu sittīna sittaẗu faddān:an fadādīna
qaṭīʿaẗu ʿabdi *** ***
wa min hā qurà ʾahnāsa ḫamsaẗu ʾālāf:in wa ʾarbaʿu miʾaẗ:in wa sittaẗ:un wa ṯalāṯīna
faddān:an
min ḏālika ʾarḍu ăs siǧillāti ʾarbaʿaẗu ʾālāf:in wa miʾatayni wa ḫamsaẗ:un wa ʾarbaʿīna faddān:an
ăl faḍlu ʿalà ăs siǧillāti ʾalf:un wa miʾaẗ:un wa tisʿīna faddān:an ***
fa ǧamīʿu faḍli kūraẗi dalāṣa wa qurà ʾahnāsa
ʿalà ăs siǧillāti ***
wa buwayṭ wa qurà ʾahnāsa

In the name of God the Merciful and Compassionate.
Document of the aggregate of the gross receipts Record of the aggregate account of the gross receipts
from the survey of the disctrict of Dalāṣ and the villages of Ahnās from the survey of the disctrict of Dalas and the villages of Ahnas
in respect of the sown land, vineyards, gardens etc.
(situated) in them. In the district of Dalāṣ eight thousand and thirty nine [faddāns]. (situated) in them. In the district of Dalas there are 8,039 [faddāns].
Of this the land of the registers - three thousand, eight hundred and forty/four [faddāns]. Of this, the land (recorded in) the registers is 3,8?? [faddāns].
The increase over (the amount recorded in) the registers is 2,3?4 [faddāns]. The increase over the registers - two thousand, three hundred and [?]-four [faddāns].
The sown land of the amir - May God preserve him! - six [...faddāns] The sown land of the ʾamīr, may God preserve him, - sixty/six [faddāns]
The estate of... The estate of ʿAbd...
And in respect of them (i.e., the sown land, vienyards, gardens etc.) the villages of Ahnās - five thousands, four hundred and thirty-six And in respect of (the same), the villages fo Ahnas are 5,436
f[addāns].
Of this the land of the registers - four thousand, two hundred and forty [faddāns]. Of this, the land (recorded in) the registers is 4,245 [faddāns].
The increase over (the amount recorded in) the registers is 1,190 faddāns. The increase over the registers - one thousand, one hundred and ninety faddāns.
The total of the increase of the district of Dalāṣ and the villages of Ahnās The total of the increase of the district of Dalas and the villages of Ahnas
over the registers [ ].
And Buwayṭ and the villages of Ahnās ... and Buwayt and the villages of Ahnas
